dict.acceptation: 碰撞，撞击；肿块；隆起物；鹭鸶的叫声；
突然地，猛烈地；扑通一声；

sent.orig: Assign placeholder texture maps to the diffuse and bump material slots for each of your models.
sent.trans: 为您的每个模型分配占位符纹理地图到Diffuse和Bump材料通道。

sent.orig: Bump! Bang! Bump! Bang, we go!
We gon' have this motherfucker off hoppin' in a second (Bump Bump)
sent.trans: 我们要在1秒之内让这个混蛋失去希望（碰撞）

sent.orig: The two children collided with a bump.
sent.trans: 两个孩子砰的一声撞上了。

sent.orig: The gangsters threatened to bump him off if he would not tell them the secret code.
sent.trans: 匪徒们威胁说，要是他不说出密电码儿，就要把他干掉。
